head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MAY, HELEN COHEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MAY, HELEN COHEN

block.p: MAY--Helen Cohen, 87, died Sunday, January 7, 2007. Born in New York City on January 26, 1919. Beloved wife of the late Arthur May. Cherished mother of William May (Mary Jane) and Roni May Scheinman. Devoted grandmother of Greg (Kate), Sandy, and Jarret Scheinman. Great-grandmother of Auden and Harper. Private graveside funeral.

MAY--Helen Cohen, 87, died Sunday, January 7, 2007. Born in New York City on January 26, 1919. Beloved wife of the late Arthur May. Cherished mother of William May (Mary Jane) and Roni May Scheinman. Devoted grandmother of Greg (Kate), Sandy, and Jarret Scheinman. Great-grandmother of Auden and Harper. Private graveside funeral.
